name: Atomwars
description:
Start by pressing the Big Bang button on the top of your screen. Move using the mouse and W.

Collect atoms, get bigger, kill smaller enemies. You have to collect atoms in sets of three. Check the top left corner for your power and what atoms you need. The pink line points to the nearest enemy.

Done in 3 hours over 2 cups of coffee.

by d-cave

@dcave4
